name: Cats And Jigsaws
description:
After the night, the kitties finally quiet down. Now, they are disorderly sleeping in different places, drag the left mouse button to move the kitties, and rotate them with the right mouse button to put them neatly together~

----------------------------------------------------------------------------

----------------------------------------------------------------------------

Game Features


--Pure hand-painted interface and kitties.
--More than 30 kinds of kitties, relax your body and mind to have fun with them!
--Added with a log mode, you can record what you need to do every day to urge yourself.
--After clearing the level mode, you can unlock the daily mode.
